abstract: Yelp is the latest Silicon Valley tech company to put down roots in New York, following in the footsteps of Twitter, Facebook and Google.
snippet: Yelp is the latest Silicon Valley tech company to put down roots in New York, following in the footsteps of Twitter, Facebook and Google.
lead_paragraph: On Wednesday, Mayor Michael Bloomberg went to Union Square to welcome Yelp, the latest Silicon Valley company to put down roots in Manhattan.

headline.main: Mayor Bloomberg Welcomes Yelp to New York
